Looks Like Your Shopping Cart is Empty, Let\'s Start Shopping Right Now !!

1. Sakura Boutique is the online shop which selling Clothes, Mainly focus on Women's Wears.

 2. There are 7 different Categories you can Browse in Sakura, (1) Tops Wears, (2) Bottoms Wears, (3) Dresses, (4) Traditional Burmese Dresses, (5) Shoes and Bags, (6) Accessories, (7) Men's Wears.

 3. We have been here in Myanmar since 2018, and Our Products have guarantees for quality and fair price.

 4. The order pending time or deliver time can be up to 2 weeks, but we will deliver to your home ASAP!!.

 5. The Average Deliver fees is 2500_3000, but can different depending upon your deliver address.

 6. We will contact you for confirmation of delivery charges as soon as we received your orders.

 5. Our mission is to bring ease of use and comfortable for the users. Please also check our Facebook Page. Thank you for your support. XOXO!!
